GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: responds with the specific reviews associated with provided review_id

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: accepts an object in the form { inc_votes: newVote }. If newVote is a positive integer, the votes property in the given review_id will be increased by newVote value. If newVote is a negative integer, the votes property in the given review_id will be decreased by newVote value. The patched object will then be returned

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: responds with an array of comments associated with provided review_id

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: accepts an object in the form { username: username, body: body } and returns the newly added comment
